text.__SUMMARY__: Penicillium waksmanii is an anamorph species of the genus of Penicillium which was isolated from the alga Sargassum ringgoldianum. Penicillium waksmanii produces pyrenocine A, pyrenocine C, pyrenocine D and pyrenocine E
text.Further reading:

"Purification, characterization, and specificity determination of a new serine protease secreted by Penicillium waksmanii".
